name: Djamarsa
aura: Increases Ally DEF in All Battles by 20%.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn. 

If Crohnam is on the same team, and the [Sleep] debuff was resisted or blocked, places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff instead for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be blocked.
skills.name: Night's Finger

Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 6: Damage +5%
Level 7: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
Heals a target ally by 30% of their MAX HP and fills their Turn Meter by 30%. 

If this skill is used on Crohnam, Crohnam will instantly activate their Berserker's Delight skill.
skills.name: Radiant Moon
skills.books:

Level 3: Heal +5%
Level 4: Heal +10%
Level 5: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Revives all dead allies with 30% HP and 30% Turn Meter.
skills.name: Moonlit March

skills.desc: Whenever an ally uses an Active Skill, has a 20% chance of decreasing the cooldown of that skill by 1 turn.
